attributes.action: Call the Israeli government to account for its continued illegal settlements policy and disregard for international law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is well known that Israel's illegal settlements policy, in flagrant breach of international law and UN and international agreement, has been and is a means of systematically annexing Palestinian land, thereby preventing and pre-empting efforts to re-establish peace and the possibility of a Palestinian state.
We call upon the Prime Minister to use his legal, historical and moral authority to address this injustice with the Israeli government as a matter of urgency and to take steps to do this with the governments of other nations collectively also.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Call the Israeli government to account for its continued illegal settlements policy and disregard for international law."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19154


Prime Minister's Office
